title: Electric flux - circle of area A with flux Phi

content.question: A uniform electric field is normal to a circular surface of area <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>A</mi></math>. If the electric flux through the circle is <math alttext="phi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi></math>, what is the magnitude of the electric field?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 1 over A phi" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
